snippet.description: I found this recipe in a Taste of Home magazine.

snippet.title: Chris' Texas Style Chili Con Carne
snippet.description: We picky eaters don't always appreciate beans in our chili. My friend Chris in Cleveland gave me this recipe about 15 years ago. Hope you enjoy it...

snippet.title: Crescent Sausage Snacks

snippet.title: Blueberry Banana Muffins With a Pecan Crunch
snippet.description: I like this recipe because it uses a convenient muffin mix, but is made special with extra added ingredients and a delicious topping.

snippet.title: Chocolate Chip Blondies
snippet.description: These are a perfect easy treat for anytime of the day.
